General.Name: Indo Borax & Chemicals Limited
General.Description: Indo Borax & Chemicals Limited manufactures and sells boron and lithium products in India. It offers borax products, such as decahydrate crystals and decahydrate granular; boric acid products that include boric acid I.P. grade powder and granular, tech grade granular, and tech grade powders; and lithium hydroxide monohydrate products. Indo Borax & Chemicals Limited was incorporated in 1980 and is based in Mumbai, India.
